mapper.sql: p.id,p.name,pr.router,p.des, p.sort,p.memo, p.parent_Id as parentId, pp.name as parentName, pr.resources_url as menuUrl, p.icon_Class as iconClass, p.is_Menu as isMenu, p.is_Privilege as isPrivilege
id,memo,router, privilege_Id as privilegeId, is_Menu as isMenu, resources_Url as resourcesUrl
mapper.update: update yj_privilege set delete_flag=1 where id in (select id from yj_privilege start with id=#{id} connect by prior id=parent_id)
update yj_privilege_resources set delete_flag=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select distinct sm.id, sm.code, sm.name, pr.router, pr.resources_url as menuUrl, sm.parent_id as parentId, icon_Class as iconClass, sm.sort from ( select distinct d.role_id from yj_user_role d where d.user_id = #{id} ) ur inner join yj_role_privilege mp on mp.role_id = ur.role_id inner join (select * from yj_privilege where delete_flag=0 and is_menu=1) sm on sm.id = mp.privilege_id or sm.is_privilege=0 left join (select * from yj_privilege_Resources where is_menu=1) pr on pr.privilege_id=sm.id order by sm.parent_Id,sm.sort

select
from yj_privilege p left join yj_privilege pp on pp.id=p.parent_id left join yj_privilege_Resources pr on p.id=pr.privilege_id and pr.is_menu=1 where p.delete_flag=0 order by p.sort

select decode(rp.role_id,null,0,1) isChecked, p.id,p.name,p.parent_id parentId from yj_privilege p left join (select role_id,privilege_id from yj_role_privilege where role_id=#{roleId}) rp on rp.privilege_id=p.id where p.delete_flag=0 order by p.sort

select
from yj_privilege_resources where privilege_id = #{id} and delete_flag=0
